description: Furnish labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision...
duration_in_months: Therefore, The combination of expectedContractStartDate and expectedContractEndDate makes it impossible to provide a dualaration in months for this dataset without estimating time frames for closure. However, TF primary concern is to sequentially provide the closure dates first, as below: expectedContractStartDate (2024-06-27), expectedContractEndDate (2025-08-12), and therefore the total duration planned for this project shorten estimation time duration is derived thereof. Venture then, TF
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
==========================

**Tender Title - Titre du lancement de l'appel d'offre**
------------

W684H-240215 RISO Roofing Repairs (CFB Halifax, NS)

**Publication Details - Détails de la publication**
-----

* Reference Number: WS4578372915-Doc4601290611
* Solicitation Number: WS4578372915
* Publication Date: May 23, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 25, 2024, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: June 19, 2024

**Contract Details - Détails du contrat**
-----

* Expected Contract Start Date: June 27, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: August 12, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
  * Nicole Fesseha, SPAC/PSPC, nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Scope of Work - Champ des travaux**
-------------------

The requirement includes the repair and installation of various types of roofing systems at various locations within Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, in the Halifax Regional Municipality (HRM).

**Tender Process - Lancement de l'appel d'offres**
-----------------------------------------

* Tender Type: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
* Tender Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Criteria comprising Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements - Accords commerciaux**
-------------------------------------

The requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Notice URL - URL de l'avis**
---------------------------

The full notice can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/197
